title: MADAARI Official Trailer 2016
desc: Miraj Entertainment, Bharat Shah & Easemytrip.com present, Paramhans Creations, Dore Films & Saptrishi Cinevision production MADAARI Official Trailer Video exclusively on T-Series. The social-thriller film is starring Irrfan Khan, Jimmy Sheirgill & Tushar Dalvi in leading roles, directed by Nishikant Kamat, produced by Shailesh Singh, Madan Paliwal, Sutapa Sikdar & Shailja Kejriwal.

title: Kabali Tamil Movie | Official Teaser
desc: KALAIPPULI S THANU Proudly Presents, Padma Vibhushan Superstar RAJINIKANTH in KABALI- 2016 Tamil movie Official Teaser. Written and Directed by Pa.RANJITH. Kabali movie also features Radhika Apte, Nassar, Winston Chow, Roshan, Dinesh Ravi, Dhansika, Kalaiyarasan, John Vijay, Kishore, Riythvika, among others.
